post.body: in ur neck of the woods today! West on el dorado! Didn't no this area was here!!
Where were you lunching?!?! And thanx for the invite...you know I live for these sightings!
Maybe I missed it b-4, but what are the ages of your kids? I have a girl (Imelda=11) and boy (W=13) who can b a handful...
- Twit us during the snooze-fest...you know you want to...
& lv-where the hell r u CBs today? I'm twittering alone - oh, no, would that b called "twitter-bating"??!!
unfortunately at my house it's "survival" this year as my husband (father of my 2 peeps) decided to leave us.
sweet news on keeping the job! My potentally-soon-to-b X just got laid off last week. Ouch!
so r u inviting the masses to meet u for happy hour???? I have both peeps plus 1 tonight. I think r kids r abt the same age.
not to reveal age, but when I was growing up here as a kid, Plano didn't even exist!
congrats on FFL!! drinks on u Tonite!
keep the fudge packin on the side silly girl! Have met budd face to face and I'll vouch for him. Don't want other visual!!!
discovered I have a webcam on laptop. Oh no...
Rastafarian only in my dreams! But it might make me feel better! Bring some on over! I'll make worth ur while!!!
I tried formatting in cell phone first. Having too many probs!! Need help!!
has SlutMuffin joined us????
I don't know WHO's ringing my bell, but I wish they'd show their face! It a bit lonely here today...much too quiet all alone!
curious...did CougarBait get any action in the boy's room???
Just found out I'm a pronater! QLF?
Just got call from Catholic Prep School...would I recommend Scandy as a respectable person. Hmmm, how do you define "respectable person"?
Need to jump in the shower so I get get moving out of the house today! Lunch plans, mystery shopping, regular shopping, yadda yadda yadda.
Quoting Cara (Jeana's daughter on RHOOC), "I want to make money and do nothing." Ahhh, so she is the smart one!
Listening to LV have a bitch session...glad I don't have her job...in fact I don't want any job!
Working on an invitation to a Fairy Tale Ball...must get some creative juices flowing. Must go find some good meds...
Just gave a scandalous early Xmas present to Scandy. Can't divulge as have same hanuka gift for LV! Hmmm...
http://www.urbanspoon.com/x/Rwc Have dines at Zorba's on many occasion. It's a BYOB place - which is great on the budget! and it can re ...
Hey there...is that Suburbia Steph I see twittering???
needs to be creative and design an invitation for a Ballet Fundraiser called "Fairy Tale Ball" for father/daughter dance.
Just got bitch-slapped by Scandy for being unavailable all day. Had a needy child to attend to. Back on the scandalous route asap!
Getting hosed by office depot trying to buy a new photo printer.
It's colder than a witch's tit outside! What the hell?!?! This is Texas! Where's my sunshine?????
Can u believe my gift of swarovski crystal handcuffs was the most stolen gift at Bunco!!
And my other neighbor passed out doing the splits bra-less under the Xmas tree!
Last year's Xmas Bunco party found my self-adhesive nu-bra stuck to the side of my neighbor's car!!
Getting ready for Xmas Bunco. Think my uptight neighbors will appreciate my swarovski crystal sterling hand cuffs 4 my secret Santa gift?!?!
Just caved and usurped the monk by buying my kids Ã¼ber cool cell phones for Xmas! How pissed will he be.
Working the Sugar Plum Fairy Tea at the Westin. Saw my sweetheart Hector (who my daughter calls Zorro). Need champagne.
thinking Scandy is having herself a good ole time at the Xmas party being the little wifey? Oh, no, too much information Judy Blume?
wondering how do I do an "@" message from my laptop? So easy on iPhone.
and don't have a good name for son yet, so "W" came to mine cus he has something personal in common w/ our President...
want u 2 no, daughter's name on the blog used to b "lil' o Annie" but I am not comfy with that...I renamed her Imelda for obvious reasons.
Home with all the peeps (even some who aren't mine) tonight...looks like I'll be clittering, errrr, I mean twittering some more!
Who's up for a virtual happy hour?!? I can't leave my house tonite. Great nite for outside fire place action.
Just feed the furry 4-legged peeps. They demand dinner earlier and earlier each day!
Running late AGAIN to pick up spawn from school! What'll it cost me this time?!?!
the sun is shining so bright that it's bouncing off my sequined sweater making me an insto disco ball in my car.
Definitely NOT good pedicure weather! I'll b a fool in my paper flip flops from the spa!
Doing pretty good job at rallying for butt cracker events tonite. Good drugs r goooooooood!
On my way to pharmacy. Feel like shit and must self-medicate STAT!
trying to get into trouble...and slowly succeeding...
am thinking my pot-smoking cough is turning south...my doc is closed, so do I chance it going to a doc-in-the-box? breathing hurts.
having a bitch of a time trying to customize my kids' new cell phones! I can't get laptop to recognize memory cards!
I tried eharmony once, but I listed "separated" and it said, "Good luck with that...visit our site for marriage counseling"...uh, no thanx.
wondering why Amazon.com wastes sooooo much money on separate shipping boxes! Just got a GIANT box with a tiny jar of Dormond! Waste!
Someone keeps ringing my doorbell. Who would be wanting to get in here knowing I'm home alone?!?!
Tried vlingo that I got from CougarBait, but it doesn't seem to work right.
checked out photos from last night ... CougarBait certainly is a cutie! Hope he continues to come to the par-tay!
Thinks I'm in need of some innocent (or not so innocent) flirting.
